scripts.minify: postcss build/<%= moduleFileName %>.css -u cssnano -o build/<%= moduleFileName %>.min.css
scripts.custom-props:min: postcss index.css -u postcss-import -u cssnano -o build/<%= moduleFileName %>-cp.min.css
scripts.build:dist: npm run clean && npm run setup && npm run transform
scripts.build:dist:min: npm run build:dist && npm run minify
scripts.build:test: npm run clean && postcss test/index-test.css -u postcss-import -u postcss-cssnext -o build/test.css
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run setup && npm run build:dist
scripts.serve:test: npm run build:test && npm run serve
scripts.lint:css: npm run setup && postcss index.css -o build/linted.css --config test/postcss.config.js && rm build/linted.css
